DOC.detailed_description: Although burden cancer high among individual ethnicity , ethnic difference cancer incidence mortality exist . African-Americans experience high incidence certain cancer compare White population , mortality rate least 40 % high population . Obesity , high fat , low fruit ( F ) vegetable ( V ) intakes increase cancer risk . Cancers may develop long period time , possibly initiate childhood ; therefore , promote FV prevent excess weight gain childhood could cancer protective . Families influence child 's dietary behavior direct model dietary behavior , parent skill around food , control home food environment . However , intervention study focus family influence dietary behavior , particularly among ethnic minority group may differ cultural aspect family functioning . Unfortunately , low participation rate community-based family intervention suggest alternate intervention delivery system investigate . The internet provide family access within convenience home . In previous R21 application , Principal Investigator develop eight-session interactive web-based program promoting healthy home food environment African-American family 9-12 year old daughter ( Family Eats ) . Family Eats evaluate feasibility change mediate variable obtain . This proposal test efficacy Family Eats web program improve FV dietary fat behavior weight outcomes among 320 AA family 8-12 year old child . This important study pioneer new channel behavior change intervention African-American family hold promise reach large number child family , enable adopt healthy eating behavior achieve energy balance reduce cancer risk .
